message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,500 is a fair offer, I'm looking for something closer to $13,500.  This product is in high demand and I'm confident in its value.

I understand that the product is in high demand, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $12,500 and $13,500, so I'm offering $13,000 for the product. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
